players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Vote him."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. Maybe Alice did. Charlie is lying, he's not the detective."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Charlie's claim is suspicious; Bob says he's not detective. I think Charlie is mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob, he's mafia. He knows I'm detective. Alice, trust my investigation."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. I was with Alice. Charlie's claim is false. Alice, trust me."
You: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Vote him."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Maybe Alice did. Charlie is lying, he's not the detective."
Alice: "I didn't kill Diana. Charlie's claim is suspicious; Bob says he's not detective. I think Charlie is mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob, he's mafia. He knows I'm detective. Alice, trust my investigation."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. I was with Alice. Charlie's claim is false. Alice, trust me."
Alice: remained silent.

Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. Maybe Alice did. Charlie is lying, he's not the detective."
Alice: "I didn't kill Diana. Charlie's claim is suspicious; Bob says he's not detective. I think Charlie is mafia."
You: "I investigated Bob, he's mafia. He knows I'm detective. Alice, trust my investigation."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. I was with Alice. Charlie's claim is false. Alice, trust me."
